name: SpaceForce (Arnez44)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project.

Modifications:

1.) I changed Player's names  with specific colors for each level.

2.)Changed Menu Titles/Options Colors. I also gave each level its own name (Name of enemy you're facing.

3.) Made Special Pink enemies in Level 2 with Extra Health for extra difficulty.

Created by Kijuan Dent
